item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-09-05
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Trying to work with the Facebook API, oh it's a treat to work with. (Sarcasm alarm) #
  • w00t! I got it to work! #
  • Good morning twitter! You should follow @fictfact & become a fan on our Facebook page - #
  • Anyone use the Foursquare app? Hasn't worked for the last 2 days. #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
